queries.name: SignIn_SignUp_Bonus
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(logtime) datetime, sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where applicationname='APIHUB2' and method like '%processbonus%' group by trunc(logtime) order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7

queries.name: CFL_Medallia_Total_Requests
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(logtime) datetime, sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where applicationname='CFLWebService' and method like '%SMSForwading%' group by trunc(logtime) order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7

queries.name: CFL_SMS_Sent_Success
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(s.Itrcvdate) datetime, count(1) total from SMSQUEUE s where s.bookedid is null and  s.status=40 and s.sndrcv='S' group by trunc(s.Itrcvdate)  order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7

queries.name: CFL_SMS_Received_Success
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(s.Itrcvdate) datetime, count(1) total from SMSQUEUE s where s.bookedid is null and  s.status=40 and s.sndrcv='S' group by trunc(s.Itrcvdate)  order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7

queries.name: CFL_SMS_Failed
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(s.Itrcvdate) datetime, count(1) total from SMSQUEUE s where s.bookedid is null and  s.status=40 and s.sndrcv='S' group by trunc(s.Itrcvdate)  order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7

queries.name: Total_error
queries.query: select * from ( select trunc(logtime) datetime, sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where status !=200 group by trunc(logtime) order by 1 desc) where datetime !=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<= 7

queries.name: Error_Status
queries.query: select status,  sum(totalrequest) total from tblapilogsummery where status !=200 and trunc(logtime)=trunc(sysdate-1)  group by status
